sentence.Network_en: We use environmental friendly waterborne materials for coating which has no smell.

entry.tran: （疾病等）经水传染的，由水传播的
entry.def: A water-borne disease or infection is one that people can catch from infected water.

example.ex: UN officials are warning of an outbreak of cholera and other water-borne diseases.
example.tran: 美国官方发出了霍乱和其他经水传播的疾病可能会爆发的警告。

entry.def: Something that is water-borne travels or is transported on water.

example.ex: Environmental pressures are strengthening the case for waterborne freight.
example.tran: 环境的压力使人们更加认可水上运输。

auth_sentence.content: Waterborne illnesses also followed a natural disaster in Pakistan.
